Title: Is Bribery Giving My Competition An Edge?
Description:
Today we’ll hear about:

•             A project manager wondering if it’s ethical to give gifts to earn business

•             A leader at Chick-fil-A looking for ways to get his team to be proactive

•             A business owner struggling with the requirements of a large government contract

•             A dentist considering if she should pay off her building with her cash reserves
